name: DebtLocked Dual
description:
VOTE FOR PLAYERS CHOICE

Roll the dice and compete against your friends to save your life in a large array of mixable duals. Stack the deck in your favour with power ups and survive against all odds to buy your freedom back in DebtLocked Dual! ♠    ♥    ♣    ♦

DebtLocked Dual is a 2-4 player multiplayer party game where mechanics are combined into one! With 4 possible game modes, it means there are 6 unique levels for players to play in! There's dodgeball, falling platforms, pachinko, and bumper bots! Face off against your friends in split screen or in online multiplayer!
